text: Payghumber momino per khud unn say bhi ziyada haq rakhney walay hain aur payghumber ki biwiyan momino ki maayen hain aur rishtay daar kitabullah ki roo say ba-nisbat doosray momino aur mohajiron kay aapas mein ziyada haq daar hain (haan) magar yeh kay tum apnay doston kay sath husn-e-salook kerna chahao. Yeh hukum kitab (elahee) mein likha hua hai
